recipe.title: Smoked Trout Salad
ingredients: 8 ounces smoked trout, skin and bones removed, flaked
1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh chives, dill, or flat-leaf parsley
instructions: Mix onion, celery, trout, mayonnaise, sour cream, chives, and lemon juice in a medium bowl; season with salt and pepper.
DO AHEAD: Trout salad can be made 3 days ahead. Cover and chill.
